channel.title: Server auto message
channel.description:
Hey mopar,
I would like to add a auto message to my server but have got no idea how to if any one could help i would be very greatfull.
The source i am using is hybridpvp
Kings Regards, Aaran

item.title: Server auto message
item.dc:creator: @ArmaScape ArmaScape
item.description:
@ArmaScape wrote:

You will have to wait a while due to the timer time, set it to like 1 and then try again. If this doesn’t work, please tell me.

Read full topic

that has not worked ??

item.title: Server auto message
item.dc:creator: @ArmaScape ArmaScape
item.description:
@ArmaScape wrote:

[quote=“MaximusIV, post:3, topic:402153”][quote author=ArmaScape link=topic=499205.msg3650576#msg3650576 date=1309710070]
Auto message as in? Sends a message to everyone on the server every certain amount of time?
[/quote]

Yes[/quote]Client.java server sided.
Ctrl + F and find:

public void mymessage() {

After found you should see something like:

		public void mymessage() {
			EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(
				    new Event() {
				        public void execute(EventContainer c) {
				            sendMessage("Message here to all players");
				            
				        }
				    }, 100000); // change the timer if you want
				};

If you don’t have a message that sends to everybody, you will need to add that in.

Read full topic
